extendedIngredients.name: roast beef
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 cups cooked beef roast, chopped. (I use a mock tender roast.)

recipes.title: How to Make Homemade Baby Food with Meats
recipes.instructions: Fill the pot with water so that it reaches just under the steamer basket, but doesn’t touching it. Bring the water to a low boil.Rinse the broccoli and cauliflower and add it to the steamer basket.Cover and steam for 10 minutes or until the vegetables are tender with a fork.Remove and add to a food processor with the beef roast.Begin to puree, adding a little of the reserved water from steaming the vegetables. Continue to add small portions of the water until the desired consistency is achieved.

steps.step: Fill the pot with water so that it reaches just under the steamer basket, but doesn’t touching it. Bring the water to a low boil.Rinse the broccoli and cauliflower and add it to the steamer basket.Cover and steam for 10 minutes or until the vegetables are tender with a fork.

Remove and add to a food processor with the beef roast.Begin to puree, adding a little of the reserved water from steaming the vegetables. Continue to add small portions of the water until the desired consistency is achieved.
